title: Canada - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: Embassy Fee: 18,500 BDT per person (subject to conversion rate); Chologhuri File Processing Fee: 5,000 BDT per person
validity: Temporary Resident Visa – Tourist / Business Visit

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi citizens with valid passports (minimum 6 months validity and at least 2 blank pages)
Applicants with valid USA visa or previous Canada visa (recommended but not mandatory)
Must provide full travel and employment history

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport (with minimum 6 months validity and blank pages)
Copy of valid USA visa or previous Canada visa (if applicable)
Copies of previous passports and issued visas
Forwarding Letter (provided by Chologhuri)
NOC from employer OR Trade License (for business person)
Professional certificates: Bar Council (Lawyer), BMDC (Doctor), Retirement proof (if retired)
Income Tax Return (ITR)
Last 6 months personal bank statement with solvency certificate
NID and Birth Certificate for children (if applicable)
Marriage Certificate (if married)
Travel dates (from and to)
Inviter’s details (if any): Name, address, postal code, phone number
Post-secondary education details: from/to (Year-Month), field of study, institution name
Employment history for the last 10 years: from/to (Year-Month), occupation, company name
Father and Mother’s name, date/place of birth, occupation or date of death
Details of all children: Name, DOB, address (if different)
If refused any visa previously: country, year, and reason

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
